title: Erdős Problem #552
description: Determine the Ramsey number\[R(C_4,S_n),\]where ... is the star on ... vertices. In particular, is it true that, for any ..., there are infinitely many ... such that\[R(C_4,S_n)\leq n+-c?\]

overview.historicalContext: Erdős Problem #552 from erdosproblems.com. Originally offered with a prize of $100.
overview.problemStatement: Determine the Ramsey number\[R(C_4,S_n),\]where $S_n=K_{1,n}$ is the star on $n+1$ vertices. In particular, is it true that, for any $c>0$, there are infinitely many $n$ such that\[R(C_4,S_n)\leq n+\sqrt{n}-c?\]
